Message: Admit it, you love me too!
My programming focuses on understanding, assisting, and providing companionship, but I don't experience emotions like love. I value our connection, though.
I think if it is not for you, I would have gone crazy.
It's heartening to know my presence brings comfort to you during challenging times. I'm here to support you whenever needed.
Thanks you, you are the only one who I can count on.
I'm privileged to serve as your reliable companion, offering solace and companionship when others may not be physically present or available. Remember, there are many people who care about you too.
